site_title: Encrypted online accounting for freelancers with Sealas
meta_description: Zero Knowledge, Open source, Open development. All data stored encrypted, source code open to everyone, blog journey through the whole development.
header-main-title:
Accounting for freelancers.
Actually easy to use.
Privacy in Cloud.
Open Source.
header-sub-title: A safe haven for your accounting and invoicing. Cloud based, easy to use and the only one with client-side encryption.
subheader-title: Easy invoicing and accounting for freelancers and small businesses
subheader-p1: Create invoices in just a few steps and gain an overview of your finances.
subheader-p2: We value your data privacy. All your data is fully encrypted before it's sent to us so only you can access it.
registration-button: Try Sealas for free for 60 days!
our_offers: What you can do with Sealas
home_feat_encryption-body: We are the only accounting software that can’t access your data, even if we wanted to. In addition to using an SSL secured connection we also encrypt the data itself before it even leaves your browser.
home_feat_invoicing-body: Create invoices using customisable templates. They already have everything you need. Manually enter your expenses or simply import data from your online banking.
home_feat_stats-body: Gain insight into your finances at any time. Create reports to make your year-end tax report easier or simply export statements for your tax advisor, so they don’t have to dig through your bills.
feat_encryption-body:
Sealas is the only Zero Knowledge accounting software:
We can’t access your data, even if we wanted to. In addition to using an SSL secured connection we also encrypt the data itself before it even leaves your browser.
feat_invoicing-subtitle: With just a few clicks, you will be ready to send your invoice to your client
feat_invoicing-body: Create invoices using customisable templates that already have everything you need. Add your clients automatically from your contacts, see previews, and store your invoice. Download PDF invoices quickly and easily.
feat_stats-title: Powerful insights to help you with your business
feat_stats-subtitle: One-Click reports to give you an overview of your finances
feat_stats-body: Reports let you easily do your VAT reports and track your budget. Gain insight into your finances at any time by easily creating your year-end tax report.
feat_expenses-subtitle: Keep an eye on where you spend your money
feat_expenses-body: Enter your expenses manually and categorise them. With our import functionality you can just use the data from your online banking.
feat_contacts-subtitle: Store contact information for an unlimited number of your customers and suppliers
feat_contacts-body:
With one click, you can add your customers and suppliers to your invoices, to quotes, or to your expense reports. Add notes to your contacts to keep track of every detail.

Switching from another accounting application? You can use our import function to import all your existing contacts!
contact_subtitle: Questions, feedback, suggestions? Write to us!
contact_sent_message: Thank you for your message. We'll handle your request as soon as possible.
footer_cta_subtitle: And start with a free 60-day trial
footer_description: The Secure Easy And Lovely Accounting Software for freelancers and small businesses.
faq_whysealas:
We decided to develop Sealas a few years ago, when we were looking for an accounting solution for our company. One website we came across said

Our customers have already managed 24,590,160.54 EUR.

This was problematic for us for a few reasons:

  • We don't want to see our financial data used for marketing.
  • We don't want to share our financial data with anyone we don't know and trust.
  • Promises in TOS and privacy policies don't protect from data leaks and curious eyes.

Our first approach was a locally hosted accounting application. With time, our need for a user friendly solution grew. We wanted something we can access from anywhere.

Data privacy is important to us. Web applications usually encrypt the communication, but store all data unencrypted on their servers. We solve this problem by encrypting all data before it even gets sent to us.

We don't even need to promise to handle your data confidentially. We simply don't have any access.

Our goal is for Sealas to be as easy and comfortable to use as possible.
faq_encryption_title: How does my data get encrypted?
faq_encryption:
With the creation of your account, we generate a unique key for you which is saved on our servers encrypted with your password. With this key, all your data gets encrypted on your browser before it's sent to the server. All communication to the server is of course secured with HTTPS.

In detail: your password is hashed via PBKDF2 on the client and again with Bcrypt on the server. This way, we never have access to your password in cleartext. We use a symmetrical encryption method (AES). The key is secured with the hashed password. The key itself is used for securing all data on the client side, which later gets sent to the server.
faq_lostpassword_title: What happens if I lose my password?
faq_lostpassword:
We have prepared a few safeguards in case you forget your password:

  • You can set a hint for your password, which you can send to your email address at any time.
  • When you login with your browser, a safety key will be created. With this key you can log in once to change your password.
  • When creating an account, you can backup your key as a QR code by printing it or downloading it. You can also do this at any time in your account settings. With this QR code you can recover access to your account at any time.

We neither have access to your password, nor can we change your password. The aforementioned methods are there to help you in case you forget or lose your password, and to prevent any data loss.
registration_done_message: Finish up your registration with the link we just sent you via email.

team_dk_text: Daniel wants to make the life of a freelancer a bit easier, because he suffered through the same problems when he was one. Privacy and usability are his main concerns when developing software.
team_ig_text: Igor loves to make software infrastructure reliable and automated. This love also drives the infrastructure behind Sealas, and keeps your data safe.
index_feat_zk_body:
It doesn't matter if you're a psychotherapist or a webdesigner, your business is worth protecting.
With us all your data is stored encrypted. That way nobody can access your data, unless you give them access.
index_feat_os_body: Sealas is Open Source. Open Source in all matters technical: the source code is available on Github, and everybody's welcome to support us with pull requests.
index_feat_blog_body: ... and Open Source in spirit: we write about the whole development of Sealas and the hows and whys behind our technical, design and business decisions
